history.proof: intros. destruct ptr_ordType as [ptr_ordType_in_clients ptr_ordType_to_server]. rewrite in_cons. qsimpl time: 1. hauto lqb: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: The reference Hclient was not found in the current environment.
The reference Hclient_to_server was not found in the current environment.
The reference in_app_iff was not found in the current environment.
Not an inductive goal with 2 constructors.

In environment server : nid clients : seq nid Hnin : server \ otin clients Huniq : uniq clients the_tag : nat prec : client_state -> nid -> seq nat -> Prop prec_safe : forall (this to : nat) (s : client_state) (m : seq nat), HClient this to -> prec s to m -> msg_from_client {| tag := the_tag; tms_cont := m |} this, to : nat ptr_ordType_in_clients : Type base : Equality.mixin_of ptr_ordType_in_clients ordering : rel ptr_ordType_in_clients H0 : irreflexive ordering H1 : transitive ordering H2 : forall x y : ptr_ordType_in_clients, [|| ordering x y, x == y | ordering y x] H3 : this \\in clients H4 : to == server Unable to unify "is_true (server \ otin clients)" with "is_true ((to == server) || (to \\in clients))".

original: intros. intros Hclient. destruct Hclient as [Hclient_in_clients Hclient_to_server]. rewrite Hclient_to_server. apply in_app_iff. left. apply Hnin.
